maxInjectChars.label: Max injected context (chars)
maxInjectChars.help: Hard cap for injected context block.

autoCapture.label: Auto-capture (opt-in)
autoCapture.help: When enabled, captures memories locally after each successful turn (no cloud).

captureMode.label: Capture mode
captureMode.help: conservative = extract high-signal items to inbox. everything = dump last turn verbatim to daily log. hybrid = append raw turn transcript (jsonl) + conservative inbox capture.

autoPromote.label: Auto-promote
autoPromote.help: off (default) = stage only. safe = auto-write only very high-confidence decisions+commitments to curated files.

captureCooldownSeconds.label: Capture cooldown (seconds)
captureCooldownSeconds.help: Rate limit auto-capture per session key; 0 disables rate limiting.

inboxRetentionDays.label: Inbox retention (days)
inboxRetentionDays.help: How long to keep staged entries in project_anchors/MEMORY_INBOX.md before pruning.
